text:
Deloitte Products | Software Engineers, Tech Leads, DevOps, QA, Design Lead | London, UK | ONSITE PERMANENT

Part of our consulting business, but this IS NOT a consulting role. We're rapidly expanding the team that builds products that solve interesting problems facing multiple clients in an industry. Opportunity to work on both rapid growth products and our early stage concept testing, including our work with McLaren Applied Technologies.

https://www2.deloitte.com/uk/en/pages/careers/articles/profe...
